column4: why I can't play youtube videos in Movie Player (I see the list of videos but I can't play them) ?
Did you install all the codecs and stuff from the "restricted" packages yet? Cuz most likely, that's what yer issue is...
I didn't try to play youtube videos before, and YankDownUnder, no

Ok mate - best thing to do, my friend, is to open up the Synaptic Package Mangler and in the search box, type "restricted" - thence you will see a list of "restricted" packages - which you can TICK, and then APPLY and then install...
